tasks.title: Backend API Foundation Completion
tasks.description: Complete the missing backend API endpoints and core functionality
tasks.details: The current backend has authentication and basic recipe generation, but is missing critical CRUD operations for user preferences, recipe management, and ingredient handling. This task establishes the complete API foundation required for a production application.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all API endpoints with Postman, verify proper error handling, validation, and database operations

subtasks.title: Complete User Preferences CRUD API
subtasks.description: Implement missing endpoints for comprehensive user preferences management
subtasks.details: Build GET, POST, PUT, DELETE endpoints for user preferences including dietary restrictions, allergies, cooking skill level, time preferences, and cuisine preferences. Include proper Zod validation and error handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test all CRUD operations with valid and invalid data, verify database persistence

subtasks.title: Implement Complete Recipe Storage & Management API
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive recipe CRUD operations beyond just generation
subtasks.details: Create endpoints for saving, retrieving, updating, and deleting user recipes. Include recipe tagging, rating, favoriting, and organization features with proper user access controls.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test recipe storage, retrieval, updating, and management operations with various user scenarios

subtasks.title: Build Comprehensive Ingredient Management System
subtasks.description: Create ingredient database and user preference tracking system
subtasks.details: Implement ingredient CRUD operations, search functionality, categorization, and user-specific ingredient preferences (love, like, stretch, avoid) with efficient database queries.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test ingredient search performance, categorization accuracy, and user preference management

subtasks.title: Add Advanced Search & Filtering API
subtasks.description: Implement powerful search and filtering capabilities for recipes
subtasks.details: Build full-text search across recipes, ingredient-based filtering, cuisine filtering, dietary restriction filtering, and complex query combinations with proper indexing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test search performance with large datasets and verify filter accuracy

tasks.title: Database Schema & Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Complete database design with proper indexing, migrations, and optimization
tasks.details: Enhance database schema with missing tables, add proper indexing for performance, implement a robust migration system, and optimize for production-scale usage.
tasks.testStrategy: Test database performance under load, verify migration rollbacks, and ensure data integrity

subtasks.title: Complete Database Schema Design
subtasks.description: Add all missing tables and relationships for full functionality
subtasks.details: Create tables for recipe tags, user recipe collections, ingredient categories, recipe ratings, user activity tracking, and recipe sharing with proper relationships and constraints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all relationships work correctly and foreign key constraints are properly enforced

subtasks.title: Implement Robust Database Migration System
subtasks.description: Create production-ready migration system with rollback capabilities
subtasks.details: Build migration system with version control, rollback capabilities, automated schema updates, and safe production deployment procedures.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test migration up/down operations and verify data preservation during schema changes

subtasks.title: Add Comprehensive Database Indexing
subtasks.description: Optimize database performance with strategic indexing
subtasks.details: Add indexes on frequently queried columns, optimize complex queries, implement query performance monitoring, and establish database performance baselines.
subtasks.testStrategy: Measure query performance before and after optimization, verify index usage

subtasks.title: Implement Database Connection Pooling & Monitoring
subtasks.description: Set up production-ready database connection management
subtasks.details: Configure connection pooling, implement database health monitoring, set up automated backups, and establish database maintenance procedures.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test connection pooling under load and verify monitoring alerts work

tasks.title: API Security & Rate Limiting Implementation
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive API security measures and abuse prevention
tasks.details: Secure the API with rate limiting, comprehensive input validation, SQL injection prevention, and proper error handling without information leakage for production security.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct security testing including penetration testing and load testing to verify protections

subtasks.title: Implement Sophisticated API Rate Limiting
subtasks.description: Add comprehensive rate limiting to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage
subtasks.details: Implement Redis-based rate limiting with different limits for authenticated vs anonymous users, special limits for AI generation endpoints, and proper error responses.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test rate limiting enforcement under various load conditions and verify proper error responses

subtasks.title: Add Comprehensive Input Validation & Sanitization
subtasks.description: Ensure all user inputs are properly validated, sanitized, and secured
subtasks.details: Implement comprehensive input validation using Zod schemas, SQL injection prevention, XSS protection, file upload security, and request size limiting for all endpoints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with various malicious inputs including SQL injection and XSS attempts

subtasks.title: Implement Security Headers & CORS Configuration
subtasks.description: Add production-ready security headers and proper CORS configuration
subtasks.details: Configure security headers (CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options, etc.), implement proper CORS settings, and apply security best practices for production deployment.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all security headers are present and CORS works correctly across different environments

subtasks.title: Add API Authentication & Authorization Middleware
subtasks.description: Enhance authentication with proper authorization controls
subtasks.details: Implement role-based access control, API key management for admin functions, session management, and proper authorization checks for all protected endpoints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test authentication and authorization with various user roles and access scenarios

tasks.title: OpenAI Integration Enhancement & Optimization
tasks.description: Improve OpenAI integration with advanced features and robust error handling
tasks.details: Enhance the existing OpenAI integration with better error handling, retry logic, response caching, cost optimization, and advanced features like batch generation and personalization.
tasks.testStrategy: Test AI generation under various failure scenarios and verify robust error handling and cost optimization

subtasks.title: Implement Advanced Error Handling & Retry Logic
subtasks.description: Add robust error handling and intelligent retry mechanisms for OpenAI API
subtasks.details: Implement exponential backoff retry logic, proper error categorization, fallback responses, circuit breaker pattern, and comprehensive logging for OpenAI API failures.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with network failures, API rate limiting, and various error scenarios

subtasks.title: Add Intelligent OpenAI Response Caching
subtasks.description: Implement smart caching for OpenAI responses to reduce costs and improve performance
subtasks.details: Cache OpenAI responses using Redis with intelligent cache keys based on user preferences, request parameters, and implement cache invalidation strategies.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify cache hits reduce API calls, measure cost savings, and test cache invalidation

subtasks.title: Build Batch Recipe Generation System
subtasks.description: Allow users to generate multiple recipes efficiently with queue management
subtasks.details: Implement batch recipe generation with job queue management, progress tracking, efficient OpenAI API usage, and user notification system.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test batch generation with various batch sizes and verify proper queue management

subtasks.title: Implement Recipe Personalization Engine
subtasks.description: Add advanced personalization based on user history and preferences
subtasks.details: Build personalization engine that learns from user behavior, recipe ratings, and preferences to improve AI prompts and recipe recommendations over time.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test personalization accuracy and verify improved recommendations over time

tasks.title: Frontend Authentication System Implementation
tasks.description: Build complete authentication UI with excellent UX and proper state management
tasks.details: Create a complete authentication system including login, register, password reset, email verification, and protected routes with excellent user experience and proper error handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test complete authentication flow including edge cases, error scenarios, and accessibility

subtasks.title: Create Authentication Context & State Management
subtasks.description: Implement robust React Context for managing authentication state
subtasks.details: Create AuthContext with user state, login/logout functions, token management, automatic token refresh, persistent storage, and proper error handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test authentication state persistence across page refreshes, browser sessions, and token expiration

subtasks.title: Build Beautiful Login & Registration Forms

subtasks.details: Build login and registration forms using React Hook Form, Zod validation, Magic UI components, proper error handling, loading states, and accessibility features.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test form validation, error display, loading states, and successful authentication flows

subtasks.title: Implement Protected Routes & Navigation
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive route protection and authenticated navigation
subtasks.details: Build ProtectedRoute component, authenticated navigation menu, user profile dropdown, and proper routing for authenticated vs unauthenticated users.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test route protection with various authentication states and navigation flows

subtasks.description: Implement complete password reset and email verification flow
subtasks.details: Build password reset functionality, email verification system, and account recovery features with proper security measures and user feedback.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test password reset flow, email verification, and account recovery scenarios
